channel.title: Bandos
channel.description: i haves meed to know how to make my bandos multi-combat because atm only 1 person can att it and its super hard and i dont want to make it easier i want to make it multi-combat. Im using delta.

item.title: Bandos
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

It should. Reply with any errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos
item.dc:creator: @ramsv94 ramsv94
item.description:
@ramsv94 wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:2, topic:263036”]In your client class, search for -

public boolean multiCombat() {

You should see something like this -

public boolean multiCombat() { if(absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) return true; else return false; }

Add the coordinates of your bandos area in there.[/quote]
ohk hope this works…

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

In your client class, search for -

public boolean multiCombat() {

You should see something like this -

public boolean multiCombat() { if(absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) return true; else return false; }

Add the coordinates of your bandos area in there.
